example_queries.question: Show me all active records
example_queries.sql: SELECT * FROM your_main_table WHERE status = 1 LIMIT 100

example_queries.question: How many records are in each category?
example_queries.sql: SELECT category, COUNT(*) as count FROM your_main_table GROUP BY category ORDER BY count DESC

example_queries.question: Show me records with their status descriptions
example_queries.sql: SELECT t.*, r.description as status_description FROM your_main_table t JOIN ref_your_lookup_1 r ON t.status = r.code
